  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d170b4-375c-43b4-27c7-cd8b0dfd38d0#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Wiligelmus: Ádám és Éva teremtése.</string>
            <string language="en">Wiligelmus: Creation of Adam and Eve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wiligelmus: Kreation von Adam und von 
Vorabend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Wiligelmus : Création d'Adam et de la
veille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wiligelmus: Criação de Adam e de eve</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Wiligelmus: Creazione di Adam e della 
vigilia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Wiligelmus: Δημιουργία Adam και της 
παραμονής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Wiligelmus: Creación de Adán y de la 
víspera</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Ádám és Éva teremtése és Bűnbeesés relief, Wiligelmus mester művei.</string>
            <string language="en">Creation of Adam and Eve, The Fall relief, Master Wiligelmus's works</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Modena,  San Gimignano,  romanika itáliai romanika,  Wiligelmus,  bűnbeesés,  Ádám,  Éva,  első emberpár,  </string>
            <string language="en">Modena, San Gimignano, romanism, Italian romanism, Wiligelmus, the Fall, Adam, Eve, first pair of humans</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreation von Adam und von Vorabend, die 
Fallentlastung, Arbeiten Vorlagenwiligelmuss</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Création d'Adam et de la veille, le 
soulagement d'automne, les travaux de Wiligelmus principal</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criação de Adam e de eve, o relevo da queda, 
trabalhos de Wiligelmus mestre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creazione di Adam e della vigilia, il rilievo di 
caduta, impianti del Wiligelmus matrice</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργία Adam και της παραμονής, η ανακούφιση 
πτώσης, εργασίες κύριου Wiligelmus</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Creación de Adán y de la víspera, la 
relevación de la caída, trabajos de Wiligelmus principal</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Modena, San Gimignano, romanism, italienisches romanism,
Wiligelmus, der Fall, Adam, Vorabend, erstes Paar Menschen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modène, San Gimignano, romanism, romanism italien, 
Wiligelmus, l'automne, Adam, la veille, première paire 
d'humains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modena, San Gimignano, romanism, romanism italiano, 
Wiligelmus, a queda, Adam, eve, primeiro par dos seres humanos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modena, San Gimignano, romanism, romanism italiano, 
Wiligelmus, la caduta, Adam, vigilia, prima coppia gli esseri umani</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντένα, SAN Gimignano, romanism, ιταλικό 
romanism, Wiligelmus, η πτώση, Adam, παραμονή, πρώτο 
ζευγάρι των ανθρώπων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Módena, San Gimignano, romanism, romanism italiano, 
Wiligelmus, la caída, Adán, víspera, primer par de seres humanos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
